Event.PageTitle: Healing Ragas - Classical Indian & Fusion violinist
Event.MetaKeywords: fusion music, classical indian music, london carnatic fusion music
Event.MetaDescription: An evening of mesmerising music with Classical Indian & Fusion violinist on 07th may 2011 between 6.30 pm - 9.30 pm.
Event.EventHeading: Healing Ragas - Classical Indian & Fusion violinist
Event.Address: The Clarendon Rooms, York House, Richmond Rd, Twickenham, TW1 3AA
Event.Maindescription:
An evening of mesmerising music with Classical Indian & Fusion violinist Dr. Jyotsna Srikanth & accompanying artists Bangalore HS Sudhindra (mridangam), Shadrach Solomon (keyboards), Nishanth Rajkumar (drums), Jamie (bass guitar)

Tickets £10, £15 including snacks(children under 5 free)

All proceeds go to The Shooting Star Children’s Hospice

For tickets please call 07947 038 480 (Dr Siva Devaraj)
